faqPage.title: ACI SmartTrader Suite FAQ
faqPage.intro: Antworten auf die h√§ufigsten Fragen zu ACI Learn, ACI Risk AI und dem ACI-Token. Kein Hype, nur Transparenz.

items.question: Ersetzt der KI-Coach einen menschlichen Trader?
items.answer: Nein. ACI SmartTrader Suite liefert Analysen und Routinen, aber du bleibst entscheidungsbefugt. Die KI erg√§nzt deine F√§higkeiten ‚Äì sie gibt keine Finanzberatung ab und √∂ffnet keine Positionen f√ºr dich.

items.question: Was schaltet der ACI-Token frei?
items.answer: Er gibt Zugang zu ACI Learn, treibt ACI Risk AI an, liefert Staking-Rewards und baut deine Voting-Power in der SmartTrader DAO auf.

items.question: Kann ich die Trainings testen, bevor ich ACI kaufe?
items.answer: Ja. Der Discover-Zugang enth√§lt Videos und kostenlose Templates. F√ºr die kompletten Journeys und das Safe-Academy-Tracking brauchst du den erforderlichen ACI-Bestand.

items.question: Ist Staking f√ºr alle verf√ºgbar?
items.answer: Staking steht allen ACI-Holdern offen, die den Mindestbetrag erf√ºllen. Es belohnt langfristige Commitments und stabilisiert die Liquidit√§t.

items.question: Gibt das √ñkosystem Finanzberatung?
items.answer: Nie. Wir liefern p√§dagogische Begleitung, Tools und individuelles Monitoring, aber jede Person bleibt f√ºr ihre Entscheidungen und das Risikomanagement verantwortlich.

tokenPage.title: Advanced Capital International Token (ACI)
tokenPage.intro: ACI is the ERC-20 heart of Advanced Capital International‚Äîa deflationary, transparent asset powering education, payments, staking rewards, and long-term governance.

tokenomicsBreakdown.title: 1 billion ACI distributed for growth, liquidity, and burns
tokenomicsBreakdown.subtitle: Supply is fully minted at deployment, with zero taxes, no mint function, and manual burns executed by the multisig treasury.

rows.label: Public Presale
rows.description: 30% allocation sold across eight weeks with progressive pricing ($0.05 ‚Üí $0.30).

rows.label: Staking Rewards
rows.description: 15% reserve (150,000,000 ACI) released linearly across a 24-month staking lock.

rows.label: DEX / CEX Liquidity
rows.description: Provisioning Uniswap and CEX pools with a 12-month lock.

rows.label: Team & Founders
rows.description: 24-month vesting with progressive unlocks for builders and leadership.

rows.label: Marketing & Partnerships
rows.description: Campaigns, influence, listings, and ecosystem partnerships.

rows.label: Reserve / Buyback / Burn
rows.description: Treasury dedicated to price stabilization, progressive burns, and buyback programs. Includes the initial 50,000,000 ACI burn and quarterly burns coordinated by the ACI DAO.

tokenPage.accessDescription: Hold or stake ACI to join the presale, unlock staking yields, provide liquidity, and prepare for the future governance rollout.

items.title: Fixed ERC-20 design
items.text: 1,000,000,000 ACI minted once, zero taxes, no mint function, and manual burns available to every holder. ACI-Token schalten ACI Learn und ACI Risk AI frei, finanzieren Rewards f√ºr disziplinierte Trader und speisen die SmartTrader DAO.

items.title: Eight-week presale
items.text: 300,000,000 ACI sold for ETH with progressive pricing ($0.05 ‚Üí $0.30). Tokens are delivered after the sale, and leftovers are burned automatically.

items.title: Dedicated staking reserve
items.text: 15% of supply is escrowed inside the staking reserve and streamed over 24 months, rewarding wallets that commit to the full lock.

items.title: Multisig ownership
items.text: Ownership is transferred to a Gnosis Safe after deployment; the multisig executes burns and treasury actions with published proofs.

items.title: Audited OpenZeppelin stack
items.text: The contract inherits ERC20, Burnable, and Ownable modules with no proxy, no taxes, and audit preparation with CertiK, Hacken, and SolidProof.

items.title: Transparent treasury
items.text: 0% transaction fees, manual burn events (quarterly + annual) and a reserve dedicated to buybacks and liquidity across DEX/CEX pools.

cta.title: Build with Advanced Capital International
cta.subtitle: Review the tokenomics, join the presale, or reach out to coordinate listings, staking campaigns, or enterprise integrations.

accessFeatures.title: Stake with flexible locks
accessFeatures.text: Lock ACI for 1, 3, or 6 months to receive 5%‚Äì20% APR rewards funded by the staking reserve.

accessFeatures.title: Manual burn program
accessFeatures.text: Quarterly burns remove 10‚Äì25M ACI, plus the Annual Burn Event (up to 50M) executed by the multisig with Etherscan proofs.

accessFeatures.title: Liquidity & buybacks
accessFeatures.text: 100M ACI is locked for 12 months on Uniswap & CEX partners, and an extra 100M reserve covers buybacks and treasury burns.

stakingSection.title: ACI Staking Model
stakingSection.description: Staking locks tokens for 24 months and distributes rewards from the dedicated 15% reserve (150,000,000 ACI). This keeps liquidity aligned with long-term builders.

simulation.title: Participation impact on rewards
simulation.subtitle: The entire 150M ACI reserve is allocated over two years. Fewer participants means a higher reward multiple per staker.
simulation.footnote: Simulations are indicative and assume the full 150M ACI reserve is distributed linearly across 24 months.

disclaimerText: Always do your own research. Nothing here is financial advice.
copyright: ¬© 2025 ACI SmartTrader Suite. All rights reserved.
aboutMissionDesc: ACI is an innovative cryptocurrency built on two pillars: an untraceable payment method and exclusive crypto training. In a world where digital transaction surveillance is pervasive, ACI offers a private and fully free payment solution, empowering users to reclaim financial autonomy.
aboutOriginDesc: The ACI project was born in 2024 from a simple observation: crypto payment solutions are becoming less discreet and less educational. ACI was therefore designed to combine anonymity, continuous training, and real utility within a secure and accessible ecosystem.
aboutCommitmentPoints: Launch of an untraceable payment system based on ACI
Access to full training once a certain ACI token threshold is reached
Audited smart contracts and absolute transparency
An identified founder and a united community
aboutCommunityDesc: ACI is not just another crypto: it‚Äôs a new Web3 vision where every holder becomes an active participant. Thanks to our training system, users holding a certain amount of tokens can access exclusive courses on trading, security, and cryptocurrencies. Together, let‚Äôs build a secure, free, and educational alternative for tomorrow‚Äôs world.
tokenomicsDesc: Final breakdown of the ACI ERC-20: presale schedule, fixed supply, manual burns, and security commitments.
raiseGoalText: The eight-week public presale sells 300,000,000 ACI for roughly {{amount}} in USD contributions (payments accepted in ETH only). Tokens are distributed after the sale and every unsold token is automatically burned.
founderRemunerationText: ACI is an Ethereum ERC-20 with {{percent}}, 18 decimals, OpenZeppelin ERC20 + Burnable + Ownable code. Every holder can burn tokens, and the multisig treasury can burn from the contract or treasury wallets.
tokenSupplyText: A fixed supply of {{total}} is minted at deployment. 50,000,000 ACI are burned at launch, quarterly burns remove 10‚Äì25 million ACI, and the Annual Burn Event can remove up to 50 million ACI‚Äîeach burn is executed manually by the Gnosis Safe multisig with public proof on-chain.
howtoStepsTitle: Steps to Buy ACI SmartTrader Suite

howtoSteps.text: Connect your wallet via the top button
Select the USD amount to invest
Confirm the transaction in your wallet

howtoFaq.question: Can I buy with a credit card?

howtoSecurity: Only buy on the official site: acipresale.com
Always verify the smart contract address before transacting.

faqItems.question: What is the price of ACI during the presale?
Can I participate from any country?
faqItems.answer: Yes, the project is open internationally (except in crypto-restricted countries).

faqItems.question: Where will my ACI be stored after purchase?
faqItems.answer: Directly in your wallet address, no intermediaries.

faqItems.question: Are ACI tokens transferable immediately?
faqItems.answer: ACI will be transferable after presale ends or at official listing.

faqItems.question: Can I resell my ACI later?
faqItems.answer: Yes, once listed on a DEX/CEX, you can freely resell them.

faqItems.question: Is there a minimum or maximum purchase?
faqItems.answer: Recommended minimum: $10 ‚Äî No maximum (while supplies last).

faqItems.question: Can I buy from mobile?
faqItems.answer: Yes, via MetaMask or TrustWallet Mobile.

faqItems.question: Can I purchase with a credit card?

coach3d.title: KI-Coach (3D-Avatar)
coach3d.subtitle: Sprich in Echtzeit mit deinem KI-Coach. Der 3D-Avatar reagiert auf deine Stimme und Emotionen.
coach3d.noConversation: Starte das Gespr√§ch, um hier Nachrichten zu sehen.
coach3d.promptFallback: Spracherkennung ist nicht verf√ºgbar. Tippe deine Nachricht, um den Coach zu fragen:

error.sttUnsupported: Spracherkennung wird von diesem Browser nicht unterst√ºtzt. Nutze das Texteingabefeld unten, um mit dem Coach zu chatten.
error.ttsUnsupported: Sprachausgabe ist auf diesem Browser nicht verf√ºgbar. Der Coach antwortet daher nur schriftlich.
error.generic: Der Coach ist nicht verf√ºgbar. Bitte sp√§ter erneut versuchen.
error.microDenied: Mikrofon nicht verf√ºgbar. Erlaube den Zugriff in deinem Browser.
error.avatarLoad: 3D-Avatar nicht verf√ºgbar. Eine vereinfachte Ansicht wird angezeigt.
error.cameraUnavailable: Die Kamera wird vom Emotionsmodul gesteuert. Aktiviere sie dort.

calm: Atme durch, ich bleibe bei dir.
energetic: Ich sp√ºre dieses Leuchten in dir.
Lass uns diesen Schwung lebendig halten.
neutral: Danke, dass du das mit mir teilst.
Ich nehme jede Nuance wahr, die du ausdr√ºckst.

guidance.stress: Lass uns 20 Sekunden zusammen nehmen: Atme 4 Takte ein, halte 2, atme 6 langsam aus. Stell dir beim Ausatmen vor, wie der Druck geht.
guidance.fear: Kl√§ren wir, was dich sorgt: Schreib das Szenario auf, das du f√ºrchtest, und daneben, was du wirklich kontrollieren kannst.
guidance.sadness: Ich sp√ºre niedrigere Energie. G√∂nn dir eine bewusste Pause: Atme, strecke dich und liste drei kleine Erfolge der letzten Zeit auf.
guidance.confidence: Wir bauen dein Selbstvertrauen neu auf: Erinner dich an eine Situation, in der du trotz Zweifel standgehalten hast, und analysiere, was den Unterschied machte.
guidance.motivation: Wenn die Motivation sinkt, kehre zu deiner Kernintention zur√ºck. W√§hle eine Zehn-Minuten-Aktion, die dein Warum wieder entfacht.
guidance.focus: Sch√§rfen wir deinen Fokus: Formuliere dein Ziel in einem Satz, blocke 30 Minuten und entferne einen zentralen St√∂rfaktor.
guidance.anger: Ich merke die Spannung. Schreib schnell auf, was dich ausgel√∂st hat, und √ºbersetze jeden Vorwurf in ein konkretes Bed√ºrfnis oder eine Grenze.
guidance.gratitude: Danke f√ºr deine Offenheit. Verankere diese Dankbarkeit: Nenne eine Person oder Erkenntnis, die du in deinem n√§chsten Schritt ehren willst.

guidanceFallback.stress: Lass uns zur Ruhe kommen: Atme tief ein, halte zwei Sekunden und atme sanft aus. Sag mir, was den Druck l√∂sen w√ºrde, wenn du soweit bist.
